entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 6:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Wind: SE 29 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Freezing rain inland overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon then west 50 gusting to 70. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening with flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
